articles.author: Jay Harris and Jacob Tanswell
articles.title: Ollie Watkins’ celebration of Aston Villa winner at Brentford aimed at supporter who insulted his family - The Athletic
articles.description:
Ollie Watkins’ pointed celebration after scoring the winner in Aston Villa’s win at Brentford was directed at a home supporter who insulted his family.
Watkins said he aimed the celebration at someone who was “abusing” him on his return to the Gtech Com…
